nodes.bodyText: Hotfix for error PlatformRepo: lateinit property blockchainIdentity has not been initialized

Line causing the issue (the app seems so suspend here): 
  
    
      dash-wallet/wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/dashpay/PlatformRepo.kt
    
    
         Line 628
      in
      4448baa
    
    
    
    

        
          
           BlockchainIdentity(platform, creditFundingTransaction, wallet)
This issue comes from evonet-develop branch
Thanks for this report.  It will be fixed in a different PR.

The current contract for dashpay only allows 20 and 140 characters.  Hopefully this is changed for the next network upgrade, but for now we need to use the smaller numbers otherwise the create/update profile items will fail.
